Ok. This is what happened to me. My HP2133 would go NUTS when I tried to use wifi under linux. I also had trashed the HD. Only linux there. Anyway I was sure the machine had a Hardware issue (Ran super hot). But wanted a warranty fix. I ordered a HP2133 Windows vista install CD. Installed Windows. everything WORKED again. Me being curious - reinstalled linux and the Broadcom linux drivers. And It's worked sinc

Did you have wifi running on 9.04 (Have you used 9.04 on this lappy before 9.10?)
